sentences.sContent: Terry: Oh, Ben. I was assigned to see that captious client this afternoon. He is really the most ticklish client I have ever met. Seeing is believing!
sentences.sContent_eng: Terry: Oh, Ben. I was assigned to see that captious client this afternoon. He is really the most ticklish client I have ever met. Seeing is believing!
sentences.sCn: 泰瑞：噢，本，今天指派我去会见那个吹毛求疵的客户，他真是我见过最难对付的客户了，真是百闻不如一见啊！

remMethod.val: capt(拿) + ious → 拿(别人的缺点) → 吹毛求疵的

trans.tranOther: apt to make trivial criticisms; fault-finding; carping
